title: Skilled
content:
Skilled You gain Proficiency in 3 Skills of your choice.

You gain Proficiency in 3 Skills of your choice.

Skilled is a Feats and a Feature in Baldur's Gate 3. Feats are special talents or expertises that provide special capabilities to characters. At certain levels, your character will get to choose between an Ability Score Improvement Feature or a Feat.

Skilled Information

You gain Proficiency in 3 Skills of your choice.

How to unlock Skilled

You'll need to fulfill the following requirements to unlock Skilled

All Classes at Level 4

Skilled Tips & Notes

Notes & Tips go here
